entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
